data: Island | Seine | Cite | Church of Notre-Dame
Island formed by the alluvium and sand deposited by the Seine above the Cite | behind the Church of Notre-Dame
In the year 1308 few houses were yet standing on the Island formed by the alluvium and sand deposited by the Seine above the Cite, behind the Church of Notre-Dame.
